document.title: Clear Aligner Treatment Plan
document.summary: This treatment uses clear aligners to straighten your upper teeth. Estimated treatment time is 4â€“6 months, with most progress monitored remotely. Some attachments may be used to assist in the alignment process. Whitening is included as part of your treatment package.
key_points: Clear aligners for the upper teeth
next_steps: Begin aligner treatment with initial fitting
Schedule remote monitoring sessions as advised
Discuss any questions with your dental provider
